divs: sighting detailsmany-over ten, balloons were released around the area of wyoming valley,-w-b, pa. i saw a few w\ the american flag around them, a few red, orange, & white ones. they rose sometimes around 1000 ft. & went out. witnessed them white, & dark, after burnout. they travel w\ the wind. most went straight up w\ a wobble, or went slow across sky. [& are not to be confused w\ the ufo's witnessed by me, & others on 4th 2009]not ufo"s! & pose a danger to aircraft!
